sys_script_include.name: GetEmailAddress1

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1131426_innovate.GetEmailAddress1</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GetEmailAddress1</name><script><![CDATA[var GetEmailAddress1 = Class.create();
GetEmailAddress1.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor,{
  // Define the getEmail function.  
  // Create a GlideRecord for the User table.
  // Use the sysparm_userID passed from the client side to retrieve a record from the User table.
  // Return the email address for the requested record
  getEmail: function() {
    var userRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
    userRecord.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_userID'));
    return userRecord.email + '';
  },
    type: 'GetEmailAddress1'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-31 21:42:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>dec4a71593d10210fec474dcebba10ec</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetEmailAddress1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Innovate" source="x_1131426_innovate">5cfa5a1197d231107b8c9934a253aff3</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Innovate">5cfa5a1197d231107b8c9934a253aff3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_dec4a71593d10210fec474dcebba10ec</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-01 15:56:26</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
